sentences.sentence: They had cooperated closely in the planning of the project.
sentences.translation: 他们曾密切合作，共同规划这一项目。

sentences.sentence: Their captors told them they would be killed unless they cooperated.
sentences.translation: 抓住他们的人说如果他们不配合就杀掉他们。

sentences.sentence: Sophia described the work as the first digital artwork cooperated between an AI and an artwork collector.
sentences.translation: 索菲亚表示，这是人工智能和艺术品收藏家合作的第一个数字作品。
